caption.p: Antioxidants. The activity of superoxide dismutase (SOD), catalase (CAT), and peroxidase (POD) of detached leaves at 0 and 5 h ( A– C). The contents of total phenols and flavonoids of detached leaves at 0 and 5 h ( D, E). The total antioxidant capacity (TAC) of detached leaves at 0 and 5 h ( F). The data are shown as means ± standard errors (SE), and the study included five biological replicates. Different letters (a, b, c, d, e) on the bar represent significant differences at p < 0.05 (Duncan’s test).
